definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The Rising Sun was the badge of Edward III.
A dozen of them kept training until the sun had fully risen. Then they would have the breakfast together.
sentences.chinese: 十幾個人練到旭日高升時，才一起去喫早餐。

sentences.english: The rising sun ensanguined the east sky.
sentences.chinese: 旭日染紅了東邊的天空。

sentences.english: A little faith brightens a rainy day, helping to chase tomorrow's sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 小小的信念照亮那下雨天，策馬長鞭追趕那明朝旭日。

sentences.english: The rising sun ushered in a new day.
sentences.chinese: 旭日的升起迎來了新的一天。

sentences.english: This is the evening sunset, we are the rising sun as aurora.
sentences.chinese: 這是黃昏的夕陽，我們卻當做震旦的旭日。

sentences.english: That is the rainbow which picks from the rising sun, nobody does not love your color.
sentences.chinese: 那是從旭日上採下的虹，沒有人不愛你的色彩。

sentences.english: Please take a look at the Eastern U. S. , watch the rising sun, sky Caixia.
sentences.chinese: 請大家再看一看東方，看旭日東昇，彩霞滿天。

sentences.english: The glorious lamp of heaven, the sun.
The rim of the sun was blazing up over a sharp horizon .
sentences.chinese: 輪廓鮮明的地平線上，一輪旭日噴薄欲出。

sentences.english: The darkest hour might usher in the sunburst.
sentences.chinese: 最黑暗的時刻過後，可能就會迎來燦爛的旭日。

sentences.english: Xurisheng Iced tea has been staged on the "myth of iced tea" in the beverage market in China.
sentences.chinese: 旭日升冰茶曾上演過我國飲料市場上的“冰茶神話”。

definition: first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn

Chaoyang district in east and northeast Beijing, a county level district of Beijing municipality/Chaoyang prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/Chaoyang district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市, Jilin/Chaoyang county in Chaoyang 朝陽|朝阳[Chao2 yang2], Liaoning
to be exposed to the sun/in a position facing the sun
